name: Push-ups
description: A foundational bodyweight exercise for upper body strength.
instructions: Start in a high plank position.
Lower your body until your chest is just above the floor.
Push back up to the starting position.
safetyTips: Keep your body in a straight line.

name: Squats
description: Builds leg strength and targets the glutes, quads, and hamstrings.
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Lower your hips as if sitting in a chair.
Return to the starting position.
safetyTips: Don't let your knees go past your toes.

name: Plank
description: An isometric core exercise that helps stabilize your spine.
instructions: Rest on your forearms with elbows under shoulders.
Keep your body in a straight line.
Hold for the desired time.

name: Jumping Jacks
description: A full-body exercise that boosts your heart rate.
instructions: Stand with feet together.
Jump while spreading your legs and bringing arms overhead.
Jump back to the start.

name: Lunges
description: Targets the quadriceps, glutes, and hamstrings.
instructions: Step forward with one leg.
Lower hips until both knees are at a 90-degree angle.
Push back and switch legs.
safetyTips: Keep your front knee above your ankle.
Don't let your back knee touch the ground.

name: Crunches
description: A classic abdominal exercise to strengthen the core.
instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent.
Lift your upper body towards your knees.
Lower back down slowly.

name: Burpees
instructions: From standing, drop to a squat, kick feet to a plank.
Do a push-up, jump feet back to squat.
Jump up explosively.
safetyTips: Start slowly to master the form.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: A dynamic exercise that builds core strength and cardio.
instructions: Start in a plank position.
Alternate bringing one knee towards your chest quickly.
Continue in a running motion.
